item.description:
It's the Beechstone Apartment complex. We'll be in building 38, apartment 6.  To get there, take Robert Ave. off Highway 1 (left onto Robert if coming from Portsmouth). Moving truck will be outside so shouldn't be too hard to find .

Some refreshments [i.e. pizza and beer] will be provided, or otherwise obtained.

Cross-posted as a Facebook event:

http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=151639824894093

item.why: Erik has moved to the Seacoast to join the cause for liberty.
item.name: Moving Help Needed For Liberty Lover and New Movers Erik & Michelle
